name: Marinated Pretzels
author: Sue
summary: Large, salted sourdough pretzels work best for this appetizer. The marinade gives them a tangy, addictive flavor that's wonderful for parties, and goes well with any beverage.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry Ranch-style dressing mix
directions: Break the pretzels into a large bowl
In a medium bowl, blend the olive oil, ranch-style dressing mix, garlic powder and dill weed
Pour the mixture over the pretzels
Marinate 1 hour, tossing approximately every 10 minutes
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread the marinated pretzels on a large cookie sheet
Allow the pretzels to cool, then serve
